column5: I am heading up to the Sioux Narrows/Nestor Falls area Feb. 28th. How much snow and how much ice is up there? Should I be bringing a 4wheeler or a snowmachine??? thanks...

Hi James We have not had snow up this way in awhile and have had some melting so everything is bullit proof.No sure about ice thickness, but I'm sure it's not super thick, warm winter and we may get rain in the next couple of days so that will not help out.Good luckD'arcyhttp://www.darcyfish.com/Musky.html
Great weather for bringing your 4 wheeler.Bobwww.pinewoodsports.com
I was just up there last week. our 4 wheeler worked great not lots of snow a few inches at best on LOW. Ice was 30". Have fun. TB
